hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.bulkentry.business.BulkEntrySavingsInstallmentView( accountAction.account.accountId,customer.customerId,accountAction.installmentId, accountAction.actionDateId,accountAction.actionDate, accountAction.deposit,accountAction.depositPaid ) from org.mifos.application.accounts.savings.business.SavingsScheduleEntity as accountAction, org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer where customer.customerId = accountAction.customer.customerId and accountAction.actionDate <= date(:MEETING_DATE) and accountAction.paymentStatus=:PAYMENT_STATUS and customer.searchId like :SEARCH_STRING and customer.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and customer.customerStatus.id in (3,4,9,10,13) order by customer.customerId, accountAction.account.accountId,accountAction.actionDate
from org.mifos.application.accounts.savings.business.SavingsScheduleEntity savingSchedule where savingSchedule.actionDate >= date(:FROM_DATE) and savingSchedule.actionDate <= date(:THRU_DATE)
